title: Spending multiplier decreases when MPS increases

content.question: The value of the spending multiplier decreases when

choices.label: the marginal propensity to save increases

content.answer: the marginal propensity to save increases

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
